DOC.detailed_description: Comparison blood level side effect cariprazine 's take one two 'slow release ' tablet , 'immediate release ' capsule . We 'll also find food affect absorption cariprazine bloodstream 'slow release ' tablet .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian male age 1855 year body mass index ( BMI ) ≥ 18 kg/m2 ≤ 30 kg/m2 Have semisupine pulse rate ≥ 40 bpm ≤ 100 bpm vital sign assessment screen admission ( Day 1 ) Agree use effective method contraception partner become pregnant throughout study 4 month administration IMP , sterilize least 1 year
